PLAY.TITLE: The Life and Death of King John

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: PRINCE HENRY, son to the king.
ARTHUR, Duke of Bretagne, nephew to the king.
ROBERT FAULCONBRIDGE, Son to Sir Robert Faulconbridge.
JAMES GURNEY, servant to Lady Faulconbridge.
CHATILLON, ambassador from France to King John.
QUEEN ELINOR, mother to King John.
BLANCH of Spain, niece to King John.
Lords, Citizens of Angiers, Sheriff, Heralds, Officers, Soldiers, Messengers, and other Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Partly in England, and partly in France.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. KING JOHN'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING JOHN, QUEEN ELINOR, PEMBROKE, ESSEX,
SALISBURY, and others, with CHATILLON

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. France. Before Angiers.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter AUSTRIA and forces, drums, etc. on one side:
on the other KING PHILIP and his power; LEWIS,
ARTHUR, CONSTANCE and attendants

Enter KING JOHN, QUEEN ELINOR, BLANCH, the BASTARD,
Lords, and forces
Trumpet sounds. Enter certain Citizens upon the walls

Here after excursions, enter the Herald of France,
with trumpets, to the gates

Re-enter KING JOHN and KING PHILIP, with their
powers, severally

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The French King's pavilion.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING JOHN, KING PHILLIP, LEWIS, BLANCH,
QUEEN ELINOR, the BASTA RD, AUSTRIA, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. Plains near Angiers.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarums, excursions. Enter the BASTARD, with
AUSTRIA'S head
Enter KING JOHN, ARTHUR, and HUBERT

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarums, excursions, retreat. Enter KING JOHN,
QUEEN ELINOR, ARTHUR, the BASTARD, HUBERT,
and Lords

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The same. KING PHILIP'S tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING PHILIP, LEWIS, CARDINAL PANDULPH,
and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A room in a castle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: HUBERT

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. KING JOHN'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING JOHN, PEMBROKE, SALISBURY, and other Lords

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING JOHN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter the BASTARD and PETER of Pomfret

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. KING JOHN'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING JOHN, CARDINAL PANDULPH, and Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. LEWIS's camp at St. Edmundsbury.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, in arms, LEWIS, SALISBURY, MELUN, PEMBROKE,
BIGOT, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The field of battle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarums. Enter KING JOHN and HUBERT

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Another part of the field.
SCENE VI. An open place in the neighbourhood of Swinstead Abbey.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the BASTARD and HUBERT, severally

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. The orchard in Swinstead Abbey.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PRINCE HENRY, SALISBURY, and BIGOT
Enter Attendants, and BIGOT, carrying KING JOHN in a chair
